description:
Get your hands on a wide variety of handsome men and save the world!?

 A 'heartwarming and erotic' comedy about another world. You can't resist a good laugh!

 I, Keigo Sakura, am a 35-year-old company employee, a virgin, with only 20 million yen in savings to support me.
One day, I suddenly tripped into a fantasy world full of handsome men. The goddess who summoned me says that in order to return to the original world, I have to accumulate 'holy power' and defeat the dragon that overruns the world. So, how do I accumulate this power?

>
